name: Pinkpop

config_properties.name: Pinkpop
config_properties.description: The longest-running annual music festival in the Netherlands, held in Landgraaf since 1970.

ai_profile:
**Pinkpop 2026: A Celebration of Alternative Sounds**

Pinkpop 2026 brings together 32 artists from across the globe, offering a dynamic mix of genres. With a strong focus on alternative music, the lineup highlights the dominance of Alternative Rock (8 acts), Pop (7 acts), and Indie Rock (6 acts), while also weaving in diverse styles like Electropop, Hip-Hop, and even niche genres like Gothic Rock and Rave Rock. This yearâ€™s festival reflects a commitment to blending mainstream appeal with experimental and unique sounds.

The artist roster showcases international representation, with the United Kingdom and the United States leading the way (9 acts each), followed by a significant presence from the Netherlands (7 acts). A mix of male (20), female (8), and mixed-gender (4) acts adds a layer of diversity to the festival, though representation of people of color remains limited with only one artist identified. Pinkpop 2026 highlights a variety of voices, offering both established favorites and fresh talent from countries like Germany, Canada, and Sweden.

Audience reception of the lineup has been solid, with an average rating of 6.88 and 100% of artists rated. Most acts fall in the 7-8 range, showcasing a well-received, balanced curation. All artists are connected via Spotify links, making it easy for attendees to dive into the music ahead of the festival. Pinkpop 2026 continues to build on its legacy as a hub for diverse and innovative music experiences.
